content:
Hi @James Agnew
Is it possible to validate FHIR message based on sliced profile? I am able to upload the Structure definition of a sliced profile.
But message cannot be send with the respective profile in the meta.

Hi Binu,

Is this for DSTU2 or 3? The validator for STU3 supports slicing, but the DSTU2 one does not.

Grahame has actually written code that will get the STU3 validator to work for DSTU2 so we're going to bring that into HAPI in the next release.. so if you're using DSTU2 the answer is "not yet but soon"
I am currently using DSTU2. Thanks for the effort to bring slicing validations into DSTU2.
